item.description:
Hey guys,

looking at the wheather forecast for the remainder of the week I decided to do an evening ride on short notice this time (always something new ;-) Because lunch break just wasn't long enough last week, Tim and I didn't make the whole trail and neither did I the time before. So tomorrow I finally would like to get all the way to Joe English, which is about a 1-1.5 hour ride. In order to accomodate more people I moved the ride to the evening. The sun sets around 7 so we should have plenty of time.

Hope to see you at the trail, Christoph

http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: Trailhead on the corner of Blueberry St. and Fieldstone Dr. off of 101.
item.name: Last minute - Bicentennial Trail once more
